page.title: 13Water storage
page.content: My dad is in the{Mid Southern {Water Company.}Mid Southern covers a quite big area.{Grayshott}gets its water from{Hindhead reservoir.}The water from the reservoir is pumped though Hindhead pumping station. It is pumped to the houses in Grayshott. {Headley Downs}water comes from{Headley {Park pumping station.}At Headley Park pumping station there are four bore holes and then water is piped into a reservoir. Some of the water from the reservoir is piped into the filter house where it is cleaned. From the {filter house}it goes to the {chorination house}where it gets a small dose of chlorine. By the chlorination house there is a chlorination{settling bed,}from there it goes to the pumping station and is piped to the houses in Headley and Headley Down.
